content.text: Ein Bild sagt mehr als 1.000 Worte - aber eine

Du wählst einfach deine Lieblingsvorlage aus und fügst Deine persönlichen Bilder hinzu - völlig unkompliziert und ohne jegliche Vorkenntnisse oder technische Finessen. So kannst Du nicht nur spielend einfach deine Fotocollage erstellen, es macht auch noch richtig Spaß! Und mit unserer Auswahl an hochwertigen Materialien findest Du garantiert die perfekte Kombination, um Deine Bilder bestmöglich zur Geltung zu bringen. Bringe Deine Fotos zum Sprechen und verleihe jedem Raum Deine ganz persönliche Note - mit einer
Foto Collage von MYPOSTER
Create your personalized photo collage
Werde kreativ und gestalte eine
Fotocollage für jeden Anlass
: Bringe das Geburtstagskind zum Strahlen mit einer
Fotocollage zum Geburtstag

voller Erinnerungen aus vergangenen Jahren, perfekt für das Wohnzimmer oder Kinderzimmer, um die besonderen Momente im Leben gebührend zu feiern. Halte die magischen Momente Deines großen Tages mit einer
Fotocollage zur Hochzeit
für die Ewigkeit fest und schmücke damit dein Schlafzimmer oder Wohnzimmer. Unsere
Collage Liebe

zeigt Deinen Liebsten, wie viel sie Dir bedeuten - nicht nur am Valentinstag. Diese liebevoll gestaltete Collage bringt Romantik in Deine vier Wände und lässt Herzen höherschlagen. Verbreite Festtagsstimmung mit einer ganz persönlich gestalteten
Fotocollage Weihnachten
und verschenke Erinnerungen. Überrasche Oma und Opa mit einer Collage der schönsten Fotos ihrer Enkel. Entdecke viele
weitere Collage-Ideen

und füge Deine Bilder online zu einem Meisterwerk zusammen: feiere Baby's 1. Jahr, die Highlights deiner letzten Reise, unvergessliche Erinnerungen mit deinen Freunden oder gestalte einen kreativen Jahresrückblick mit einer einzigartigen Fotocollage.
The perfect photo collage template for any occasion
The selection of the right material is crucial to create the desired ambiance and showcase your collage to its best advantage.
Canvas prints
are particularly suitable for landscape shots, abstract artworks, and artistic photographs. These motifs gain an additional dimension due to the natural texture of the canvas.
Acrylic glass prints

are ideal for motifs that require a clear and brilliant display. Colors are rendered particularly vividly due to the smooth surface of the acrylic glass, making them perfect for high-quality photographs, portraits, and modern artworks. Acrylic glass prints work especially well in well-lit spaces like living rooms or offices. Collages of landscape shots or architectural photographs stand out particularly well on
Alu-Dibond

, as the material offers a matte surface and high color fidelity. Alu-Dibond is also suitable for use in damp areas such as bathrooms and kitchens due to its robust nature, being waterproof and wipeable.
Poster prints
are versatile and are chosen for decorating living rooms, bedrooms, children's and teenagers' rooms due to their lightness and affordability.
Find the perfect combination of design and material for your photo collage
Are you looking for a
photo collage 10x15
or perhaps a
photo collage in XXL size
? At MYPOSTER, you are not only flexible in terms of collage design. Whether you are looking for a long collage or a portrait-oriented collage - with us, you can create the perfect
collage in your desired format
for any wall and any space.
Our formats are simply smart - Fotocollage XXL or Fotocollage Din A4

content.text: If you want to create a collage quickly and easily but do not know how or lack inspiration, then you have come to the right place at MYPOSTER. You can create your
photo collage online
or with our app (available for iPhone and Android). Enjoy maximum flexibility with our
MYPOSTER Collage Maker
. Choose your favorite layout for your photo collage in our configurator and customize it to your liking - add
as many photos as you like
, change the
background color, frames, or fonts
, add
custom texts
, or enhance your collage with creative cliparts. Use our
image optimization tools
and numerous
filters
to make the most out of your images.
Creating a photo collage - super easy, super personalized
Wähle eine unserer zahlreichen Collage Vorlagen oder beginne mit einem leeren Entwurf bzw. Blanco Design, um ihn zu personalisieren
Wähle das richtige Format und das Material, auf dem Du Deine Collage drucken möchtest (Poster, Leinwand, gerahmtes Foto, Acryl, Glas, Aluminium-Dibond, Gallery Bond, Werbeleinwand...)
Lade Deine Fotos im Konfigurator hoch
Individualisiere Deine Collage mit unserem Collage Maker: kombiniere Bilder nach Wunsch, füge neue Textfelder hinzu oder nutze unsere vielen Gestaltungselemente
Tipp vom Experten
: Wir empfehlen Dir immer zuerst das gewünschte Format, in Deinem bevorzugten Seitenverhältnis anzulegen, bevor Du mit der Gestaltung der Collage mit Layout und Bildern beginnst.
How can I create a collage?
Du möchtest eine
Fotocollage erstellen
und Deinem Meisterwerk gleich den richtigen Rahmen geben? Bei MYPOSTER findest Du die richtige
Bilderrahmen Collage
: Füge in unserem Collagen-Designer einen passenden
Rahmen aus Holz, Aluminium oder Kunststoff
in verschiedenen Ausführungen hinzu und Du erhältst eine
professionell und staubfrei gerahmte Fotocollage

. Egal, ob Du einen klassischen Holzrahmen für einen nostalgischen Look bevorzugst, einen eleganten Aluminiumrahmen für einen modernen Touch wünscht oder einen robusten Kunststoffrahmen für eine praktische Lösung benötigst - wir haben die passende Rahmenoption für Deine Fotocollage. Unsere hochwertigen Rahmen sorgen nicht nur für einen stilvollen Abschluss Deiner Collage, sondern schützen Deine Bilder auch vor Staub und anderen Umwelteinflüssen, damit deine Erinnerungen lange Zeit strahlen können.
Photo collage in frame

body.headline: HOW TO CREATE THE PERFECT PHOTO COLLAGE

content.text: Printed photo collages are excellent for
decorating
your home, as meaningful
gifts
for your loved ones, or for hanging up on special
occasions
. Collages can tell stories by combining different moments or
events in a composition

, which can be more challenging to achieve with individual photo prints. They group images with a common theme in a clear and space-saving way. You can arrange the images in the collage to harmonize for presentation and visual impact, without being bound by fixed frames or sizes of individual photos. With the right tricks, you can create a
photo collage
that not only captures glances but also touches hearts. It grabs attention and
tells a story
or presents your best moments in an impressive manner.
Collagen sind darum eine beliebte Wahl
You can arrange photo collages in different ways:
Stylistic Collage

: Design your photo collage according to a specific style or aesthetic, such as Vintage or Boho. Use filters or special layouts to achieve the desired style and create a cohesive atmosphere. For example, you can create a vintage collage with old family photos, faded colors, and nostalgic elements to evoke a sentimental mood.
Chronological Collage
: Choose photos from different moments of your life and arrange them in chronological order. This way, you can relive your memories in their temporal sequence and see how they have evolved over time.
Thematic Collage
: Create a collage with photos on a specific theme, such as vacation, wedding, birthday, or travel. Arrange the photos artistically to tell a visual story.
How to merge pictures online
Bildauswahl
: Verwende nicht zu viele Bilder, um die Collage nicht überladen wirken zu lassen. In der Regel funktionieren Collagen am besten mit 5-10 Bildern.
Layout und Format
: Experimentiere mit verschiedenen Formaten, wie quadratisch, rechteckig oder sogar kreisförmig, um den gewünschten visuellen Effekt zu erzielen.
Farbliche Gestaltung

: Achte auf die Farbwahl Deiner Bilder, um eine harmonische Collage zu erstellen. Bilder mit ähnlichen Farbpaletten können gut zusammenpassen und ein zusammenhängendes Erscheinungsbild erzeugen. Du kannst auch Farbfilter verwenden, um den Bildern einen einheitlichen Stil zu verleihen.
Texte

: Du kannst eine Collage bereichern, indem Du zusätzliche Informationen, Zitate oder eine persönliche Botschaft hinzufügst. Verwende Text sparsam und platziere ihn strategisch. Wähle gut lesbare Schriftarten und passende Textfarben.
Proportionen beachten

: Achte darauf, dass die Proportionen der Bilder in Deiner Collage zueinander passen. Vermeide es, Bilder zu stark zu vergrößern oder zu verkleinern, da dies das Gesamtbild stören kann. Bei unterschiedlichen Bildgrößen platziere größere Bilder im Hintergrund und kleinere im Vordergrund.
Creating the perfect photo collage - 5 tips

A collage is an artistic technique where different images, materials, or objects are arranged and glued or attached to create a new artwork on a surface. Collages can consist of photos, newspaper clippings, texts, colors, or other elements. A photo collage is a special type of collage where only photographs are used and creatively assembled. This allows memories and events to be captured in a single image and tell whole stories.
What is a collage

No matter if you want to create a photo collage with 3 pictures, 12 pictures, or a photo collage with 100 pictures, at MYPOSTER you are maximally flexible and thanks to our matching templates, all options are open to you.
Can I create a photo collage with many pictures?
Wähle eine unserer Vorlagen oder ein Blanko Design
Lade Deine Bilder hoch
Wähle Format und Material
Fotocollage prüfen…fertig
How can I create a photo collage?
For a very good result and high-quality print, we recommend a minimum of 150 dpi (dots per inch) or in other words, 60 pixels per square centimeter.
What resolution should images have for a photo collage?
We process the following pixel-based file formats: JPG, TIFF, PNG, and PDF up to a size of 100 MB.
What file formats can I upload?

Many of our collage templates already include text elements. If you want to add more text boxes, simply click on the button with the large +T on the bottom right of our Collage Maker, next to your photo collage.
How do I create a collage with text?
Arrange your images in our collage maker either manually or choose 'auto-fill'. Our configurator will then automatically create a photo collage with your photos.
How can I arrange images in a collage?

Download our app, scroll to the Photo Collages section, and select your desired format. Then simply add your favorite photos from your phone and let our Collage Designer do the rest. If you don't want to make any further changes to the images, just choose the appropriate material and place the product in your cart. By clicking 'Order', your photo collage will then be on its way to you in the quickest time possible.
How do you make a collage on your phone?
Simply choose one of our many themed templates. With a click, you will enter our configurator where you only need to upload your own images.
How can I set a template?

In unserem Collage Maker kannst Du rechts unter dem Button "Größe" das Format deiner Fotocollage einstellen. Wir empfehlen immer zuerst das gewünschte Format, in Deinem bevorzugten Seitenverhältnis anzulegen, bevor Du die Gestaltung der Collage mit Layout und Bildern beginnst.
How do I choose the format for my collage?
After clicking on "Create Collage", choose the desired size in the Collage Maker under "Size" on the right side. For a portrait orientation, we recommend layouts such as 3:4, 2:3, or 1:2.
How can I create a portrait-oriented collage?

Yes, you can save your collage at any time by using the "save in customer account" feature to store it temporarily and continue working on it later. Simply create a customer account for this purpose. You will then find the collage in your customer account under "My Collages".
Can I save my collage and continue editing it later?

It depends on the materials used to create picture collages. If they are made from high-quality and durable materials such as canvas, acrylic glass, or aluminium composite panel, they can last for many years.
How long-lasting are photo collages?
When choosing materials, you are extremely flexible. You can create collages not only on a classic canvas or poster, but also on acrylic glass, aluminum dibond, or gallery bond.
What materials can I use for a collage?
The delivery times from handover to our shipping partners are usually 1 to 3 business days.
What are the delivery times of an online created photo collage?
Here in our
help section

you will find many answers to the most common questions. Need more detailed information? Then our customer service is available Monday to Friday 8:00 - 17:00 at 08131 380 3008, or you can email us at service@myposter.de.

body.subline: Create your perfect collage with our unique designs
body.headline: PHOTO COLLAGE DESIGN WITH OUR TEMPLATES
Photo Collage Templates: We have it all!

content.text: Whether romantic, simple, as a gift, or for a wedding, with our photo collage templates, there is definitely a design for you. Simply browse through our various categories and let yourself be inspired! Once you've found your model, you can customize it in our configurator, add your photos, change or add text, and more. You have all the creative possibilities, and thanks to the intuitive interface, you'll quickly find your way. Alternatively, you can also design without a photo collage template and start with a blank canvas. The result is always the same: a 100% personalized collage exactly to your liking, which you will still enjoy looking at even after years. Choose the right photos and start creating now!
Your collage, your design - thanks to our templates

Our design templates are just the beginning! When you have found your favorite, you can customize it completely in our configurator - on your computer, smartphone, or tablet. You can replace our sample images with your own, add as many images as you like, change the background, adjust the format and material, and more! Try out different ideas before making a decision. Save all your designs with a single click in your customer account so you can compare them later. In the end, you only need to choose the appropriate material, add a frame if desired, and order your collage. We can even print many variants for you express so that your collage will be with you the next day!
Customize your photo collage template in the configurator - make it fit.

When creating your collage, you can let your imagination run wild with us and take your photo collage template to a new level with a variety of embellishments, clip arts, and fonts. Highlight design elements or texts with gold, rose gold, or silver foiling, or experiment with different fonts until you find your favorite. Additionally, you can add image elements and clip arts that fit the theme of your collage. In the configurator, you can choose from thousands of options, easily insert, enlarge, rotate elements with a click, etc. This turns our design template into your own personal collage in no time, tailored to your vision. Start designing now for the best results!
Enhancements, graphical elements, and fonts for your photo collage template.

You can freely choose whether you want to print your collage on a poster, canvas, acrylic glass, gallery bond, and more using your template. Additionally, we can deliver your photo collage directly in a wooden, aluminum, or plastic frame upon request. This way, you can hang it on the wall right after unpacking. While designing, you can easily check the different options in the configurator and compare various models. Select the material that best matches your style and images and click on 'order'. Your collage template will look even better in real life, we promise!
The suitable material for your photo collage template.
